title: Desert Essence Conditioner, Lemon Tea Tree, 8 Fluid Ounce
features: Leaves hair soft and silky without weighing it down
description: Restore shine and health back into hair with the Conditioner Lemon Tea Tree from Desert Essence. Desert Essence was founded in 1978 around a simple concept: beauty is natural, and nature is beautiful. By bringing the best of nature's offerings to personal care regimens everywhere, they strive to strengthen the bonds between the planet and all the beings that call it home. Creating a healthy, harmonious relationship with the Earth and community is the foundation for all they do. Desert Essence believes in being responsible to others, honest, and forward-thinking to create and preserve a better future for us all.
